Pre-Game Insights: Bolivia made the perfect start at their new home venue, beating Venezuela 4-0 last month.
Colombia recorded a famous win over Argentina in Barranquilla.
Bolivia ended one of the longest competitive winless streaks last month to catapult them into qualification contention.
Their historic victory away in Chile was Bolivia's first on the road in qualifying in 67 matches, since a 7-1 win against Venezuela in 1993.
Colombia avenged that defeat by beating the Albiceleste in their last outing.
Colombia are unbeaten in their last 13 meetings with Bolivia - winning 10.
